lemma successive_successor: assumes "(a, b) \<in> set (arcs i j xs)" "b \<noteq> j" "successive P (arcs i j xs)" "P (a,b)" "xs \<noteq> []" shows "\<exists> c. (xs = [b] \<and> c = j \<or> (\<exists> ys. xs = b # c # ys) \<or> (\<exists> ys. xs = ys @ [a,b] \<and> c = j) \<or> (\<exists> ys zs. xs = ys @ a # b # c # zs)) \<and> \<not> P (b,c)"
